mapper.select: SELECT op_cd FROM outsourcing_portfolio ORDER BY op_cd DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT o.os_cd, o.os_ttl, o.os_expln, o.os_reg_ymdt, o.os_amt, o.os_flfmt_cnt, o.os_strt_ymdt, o.os_end_ymdt, o.ent_cd, o.mbr_cd, o.stc_cd, o.ctgry_id, o.adm_cd, o.os_mdfcn_ymdt, o.os_thumbnail_url, cl.cl_cd, c.ctgry_id AS category_ctgry_id, c.ctgry_nm AS category_ctgry_nm, t.tag_nm AS tag_tag_nm FROM outsourcing o JOIN outsourcing_portfolio op ON o.os_cd = op.os_cd LEFT JOIN content_list cl ON o.os_cd = cl.cntd_cd AND cl.cl_cd LIKE 'LIST_OS_C%' LEFT JOIN category_mapping cm ON cl.cl_cd = cm.cl_cd LEFT JOIN category c ON cm.ctgry_id = c.ctgry_id LEFT JOIN tag_mapping tm ON cl.cl_cd = tm.cl_cd LEFT JOIN tag t ON tm.tag_cd = t.tag_cd WHERE op.prtf_cd = #{prtfCd} ORDER BY op.op_reg_ymdt DESC

SELECT o.os_cd, o.os_ttl, o.os_expln, o.os_reg_ymdt, o.os_amt, o.os_flfmt_cnt, o.os_strt_ymdt, o.os_end_ymdt, o.ent_cd, o.mbr_cd, o.stc_cd, o.ctgry_id, o.adm_cd, o.os_mdfcn_ymdt, o.os_thumbnail_url, cl.cl_cd, c.ctgry_id AS category_ctgry_id, c.ctgry_nm AS category_ctgry_nm, t.tag_nm AS tag_tag_nm FROM outsourcing o LEFT JOIN content_list cl ON o.os_cd = cl.cntd_cd AND cl.cl_cd LIKE 'LIST_OS_C%' LEFT JOIN category_mapping cm ON cl.cl_cd = cm.cl_cd LEFT JOIN category c ON cm.ctgry_id = c.ctgry_id LEFT JOIN tag_mapping tm ON cl.cl_cd = tm.cl_cd LEFT JOIN tag t ON tm.tag_cd = t.tag_cd WHERE o.ent_cd = #{entCd} AND o.os_ttl LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM outsourcing_portfolio op WHERE op.prtf_cd = #{prtfCd} AND op.os_cd = o.os_cd ) ORDER BY o.os_reg_ymdt DESC LIMIT 10
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM outsourcing_portfolio WHERE os_cd = #{osCd} AND prtf_cd = #{prtfCd}
